PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-07512012-05-31,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectHon. Randall S. Bocock ** REMOVAL ALLOWANCE **
PrecisOrder authorizing an additional period beginning on March 29, 2012 and ending on September 28, 2012 for the reimbursement to the Hon. RANDALL S. BOCOCK of travelling and lodging costs, including amounts expended for meals, incurred before the establishment of a permanent new residence, or in order to visit from time to time members of the household still residing in the former residence.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Hon. Randall S. Bocock ** REMOVAL ALLOWANCE **
precis: Order authorizing an additional period beginning on March 29, 2012 and ending on September 28, 2012 for the reimbursement to the Hon. RANDALL S.
